text: (vicāraṇaikkāka) avarkaḷ aṉaivaraiyum nām oṉṟu cērkkum nāḷil avarkaḷil iṇaivaittu vaṇaṅkiyavarkaḷai nōkki ‘‘nīṅkaḷum nīṅkaḷ iṇaivaittu vaṇaṅkiya teyvaṅkaḷum ciṟitu iṅku tāmatiyuṅkaḷ'' eṉṟu kūṟi avarkaḷukkiṭaiyil irunta toṭarpai nīkki viṭuvōm. Accamayam avarkaḷuṭaiya teyvaṅkaḷ (eṉṟu kaṟpaṉaiyāka avarkaḷ vaṇaṅki vantavai) avarkaḷai nōkki ‘‘nīṅkaḷ eṅkaḷai vaṇaṅkavē illai'' eṉṟum
